name: Daniel Simon
description: am a person who is very real when it comes to life and its problems, honest, kind caring, loving, good sense of humor, easy going, free thinker, trustworthy and respect the lives of other people…I am a man who lives life as it comes to me. And do not worry about tomorrow, because I will be here no matter what I do. best days of my life are yet to come…..I like camping, swimming but what i do most is traveling because I enjoy sight seeing, been to both within and outside the States, also, Im a good cook and I enjoy cooking. Im just the simple me looking for the real woman to grow old with .. someone loving, caring , honest and God fearing.
